00092 typedef struct {
00093   int jmax;             
00094   int odd;              
00095   //  this is the property of right state in the
00096   //  matrix element, oddness of left state has to be deduced !
00097   int ang;              
00098   union {
00099     angprodpara angprod;
00100     angzcwpara angzcw;
00101   };
00102   int cm;               
00103   union {
00104     cmprodpara cmprod;
00105     cmpolypara cmpoly;
00106   };
00107 } Projection;

00159 // default jmax value
00160 #define JMAX 9
00161 
00162 // integer j is running 0, 2, 4, 6, ...
00163 // half integer j is running 1, 3, 5, 7, ...
00164 
00165 inline static int idxpij(int jmax, int pi, int j)
00166 {
00167   return(j/2 + pi*(jmax+1)/2);
00168 }
00169 
00170 // integer j is running 0, 2, 4, 6, 8
00171 // half integer j is running 1, 3, 5, 7
00172 
00173 inline static int idxjm(int j, int m)
00174 {
00175   return ((j+m)/2);
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 inline static int idxnjm(int a, int j, int m)
00180 {
00181   return (idxjm(j,m)+a*(j+1));
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 inline static int idxjmk(int j, int m, int k)
00186 {
00187   return (idxjm(j,m) + idxjm(j,k)*(j+1));
00188 }
